title: Dragon's Lair + Dragon's Lair II + Space Ace [DVD-VIDEO]
description:
Dragon's Lair [DVD-VIDEO]

You control the actions of Dirk the Daring, a valiant knight on a quest to
rescue a fair princess from the clutches of an evil dragon. Fight your way
through the castle of the dark wizard who has enchanted it with treacherous
monsters and obstacles. Lead on brave adventurer... your quest awaits!


Dragon's Lair II: Time Warp [DVD-VIDEO]

Princess Daphne has been spirited away to a wrinkle in time by the
Evil Wizard Mordroc who plans to force her into marriage.
Only you, Dirk the Daring, can save her.

Transported by a bumbling old time machine, you begin the rescue mission.
But you must hurry, for once the Casket of Doom has opened, Mordroc will
place the Death Ring upon Daphne's finger in marriage and she will be
lost forever in the Time Warp!


Space Ace [DVD-VIDEO]

The evil commander Borf has kidnapped Ace's girlfriend, the beautiful
Kimberley, and is plotting to enslave the Earth using his dreaded
"Infanto Ray", a weapon that changes everyone it blasts into a
helpless baby. Armed with only a laser gun, Ace must find and
destroy the Infanto Ray, rescue Kimberley and save the Earth.
All in a day's work for a superhero, right?


------
F.A.Q.
------


1. What is this DVD-VIDEO version?

There are two versions of these games in the market. There is the DVD-ROM
version which must be installed and requires Windows 95/98 to run, and there
is the DVD-VIDEO version which can instantly run in any DVD player, such as
traditional HOME players, the XBOX360 and the PLAYSTATION2.

Both versions are manufactured by Digital Leisure.
This version is the DVD-VIDEO version.


2. What are the advantages/disadvantages of this DVD-VIDEO version?

- Doesn't require a computer to run, works on most DVD players.
- Has a WATCH feature that allows you view the entire animation.
- Includes some EXTRAS with interviews with the creators of the game.
- With a few DVD players there is a 2-3 second gap between movements.
- No random game play as the original. You must play sequentially.


3. Since this is a DVD-VIDEO, what are the specifications?

Format: NTSC Color
Language: English (Dolby Digital 2.0)
Aspect Ratio: 4:3 (1.33)
Region: All


4. I have a BLURAY player.

For your own sake, DON'T download this version.
Digital Leisure has released a remastered version of these games in BLURAY,
with MUCH sharper and cleaner images, crisp 5.1 sound and widescreen format,
without any of the disadvantages of the old DVD format listed above.

Buy the BLURAY version and support them.
The experience is incomparable.


5. The download is slow.

My upload bandwidth is only 32Kb/s, so it might take some time.
I will keep seeding for as long as it's necessary.
But please, help me seed when finished.
